<The Bob Marshall Wilderness Complex

Text: Bob Marshall Wilderness Complex:  Adjoining the Bob Marshall to the north is the Great Bear Wilderness of 286,700 acres (1,160 km²), and to the south of the Bob Marshall is the Scapegoat Wilderness consisting of 239,936 acres (971 km²).
Triplets:<Bob Marshall
3:
--------------------
Text: Bob Marshall Wilderness Complex:  An additional 1 million acres of roadless National Forest, private, and BLM land surrounds the designated wildernesses on all sides, for a total roadless area of 2.54 million acres.
